Question
========

Which of the four graphs listed below can best be used to plot two continuous variables against each other?

Answerlist
----------

* Scatterplot
* Boxplot
* Bar graph
* Histogram

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Scatterplot: Correct
* Boxplot: Incorrect
* Bar graph: Incorrect
* Histogram: Incorrect
